item.description: Hi everyone! Hope you can join us for a playdate at the Atrium Mall Play Space followed by a pizza lunch at Bertucci's! Those of you without kids who want to join us for lunch and don't mind mess and noise, please do come! (And if it is a non-kid day for you, come anyways--the plus side is you'll actually get to talk to the adults!!!) If you need directions let me know! Lydia

group.name: Boston/Burbs Life after Divorce Social Group

item.name: Adults and kids playdate and lunch
